title: What font is this? Help would be appreciated
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908090544im_/http:/typophile.com/files/uksfont_4407.jpg)

I’m not sure whether this is a font or drawn, but if anyone knows which font it might be i’d be most grateful, i’ve tried all sorts of searching but can’t find it. Thanks in advance.
author: grimbalo

comments.content: Maybe, it’s similar, perhaps it’s been outlined in illustrator and tweaked as a vector. Anyone else any ideas?

Broadband is the ICG version of Neville Brody’s [Insignia](http://web.archive.org/web/20090908090544/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/insignia_virtual/?sample_text=UKS%20FORUM), but it has the same kind of S shape as your sample. I think your idea that it was traced over and simplified is probably the answer.

- Mike Yanega
Aye, that seems like it, thanks for the help you two.
